section_title: IMPLEMENTATION OF ARTICLE 4, PARAGRAPHS 8 AND 9, OF THE CONVENTION:
sentences: Implementation of the Buenos Aires Programme of Work on Adaptation and Response Measures (Decision 1/CP.10): These discussions are summarized under the SBI agenda item on Decision 1/CP.10 (see page 17).
Matters Relating to the LDCs: These discussions are summarized under the SBI agenda item on matters relating to the LDCs (see page 14).
